channel.title: EU Wants To Create Device/OS Level Backdoor
channel.description: It seems that the EU, similarly to the US, wants to backdoor e2ee communications supposedly to protect the children, but as we all know that's just a convenient excuse to justify having access to images/videos and perhaps even text messages(depending on the chosen implementations). Given that several of the top proposals leaked to the Politico would implemented on device/OS level, and I believe whonix is based in Germany, I was wondering how the whonix project would respond to such legislation if it were to pass.

item.title: EU Wants To Create Device/OS Level Backdoor
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Without looking into this in particular…
Not about any legislation specifically, this topic of “catastrophic new laws” has just now been answered in a generic way through a new documentation chapter, please see:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Trust#Legal_Issues

Read full topic
item.source: EU Wants To Create Device/OS Level Backdoor

item.title: EU Wants To Create Device/OS Level Backdoor

item.description:
It seems that the EU, similarly to the US, wants to backdoor e2ee communications supposedly to protect the children, but as we all know that’s just a convenient excuse to justify having access to images/videos and perhaps even text messages(depending on the chosen implementations). Given that several of the top proposals leaked to the Politico would implemented on device/OS level, and I believe whonix is based in Germany, I was wondering how the whonix project would respond to such legislation if it were to pass.
